body:
Well guys, I made a desicion, I have almost no time to play Minecraft or any game. The vor miss you all.

This is my face: http://imgur.com/4pXIN6k

Thanks to:

- Cyclops
- Xuph
- Tomqss
- Jess
- Acceqted
- All Avicus Staff.
Thanks to all, i will mis you guys <3
